content.prompt: A student wants to approximate the amount of work that the force due to gravity does on the student as the student walks up a set of stairs. Which of the following measurements must the student collect in order to approximate the amount of work done by Earth on the student? Select two answers.

choices.label: The angle between the inclined portion of the stairs and the horizontal.
The total inclined length of the stairs.
The final vertical height above the initial vertical position.
